src_original: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā?
tgt_original: 云何不住心？ 有過去未來現在，於何而住？ 迦葉！

src_original: kimatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ vā? iti /  tatra yadatītam, tat kṣīṇam /  yadanāgatam,  tadasaṃprāptam /
tgt_original: 過去已滅、未來未至、現在無住。

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate /
tgt_original: 迦葉！ 又此心法非在內、非在外、亦非中間。

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa arūpyanidarśanamapratighamavijñaptikamapratiṣṭhamaniketam /  cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhairna dṛṣṭam,  na paśyanti,
tgt_original: 迦葉！ 又此心法離眾色相，無住無著而不可見。 迦葉！
